name: Hydra
subtitle: Deadly Serpent
author: Jochem van Gool

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If I use Mouse Armor’s Protection ability to give my Hydra – Deadly Serpent Resist +1 and then challenge Minnie Mouse – Always Classy with that Hydra, can I use its Watch the Teeth ability to deal damage to Minnie Mouse?
A: No. Minnie Mouse – Always Classy has 1 {S} so will deal 1 damage to Hydra – Deadly Serpent, but Resist +1 will reduce that damage by 1 before any damage is dealt to Hydra. The Hydra won’t be dealt any damage.

flavor_text: More heads are better than one.
rules_text: WATCH THE TEETH Whenever this character is dealt damage, deal that much damage to chosen opposing character.
